description: '''Rosendo Ruiz Suárez''' (1 March 1885 – 1 January 1983) was a Cuban singer, guitarist and composer, considered one of the founders of the [[trova]]. He wrote over 200 songs in a variety of styles ranging from [[canción]] and [[bolero]] to [[guajira (music)|guajira]] and [[bambuco]]. Although he was a popular performer, founding several successful groups, he made very few recordings. He lived for almost a century, having a great influence on the music of his country.
